Package com.quorum.tessera.encryption

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Key
    A generic key that represents many different types of keys used for encryption
    KeyManager
    Manages local keys for the running node, include key lookups and key loading/generation
    MasterKey  
    PrivateKey  
    PublicKey  
    SharedKey  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseKey  
    KeyManagerImpl  
    KeyPair
    Container object for a public/private key pair The public and private key should be related to each other, not just an arbitrary pairing of two keys
    MasterKeyImpl  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KeyNotFoundException
    An exception thrown when a key is searched for but is not managed by this node
